hotels.title: Five-Star Abu Dhabi Island Paradise Boutique Villas with Private Beach
hotels.description: Take your luxurious Abu Dhabi escape up a notch at the five-star Anantara Sir Bani Yas Island Al Yamm Villa Resort, an island sanctuary inspired by Emirati fishing villages. Experience signature Anantara luxury at the boutique resort, home to 30-barasti-style villas, a pristine private beachfront and glistening swimming lagoons. The lavish retreat offers gastronomes dining delights across four restaurants and bars, as well as plenty of opportunities to bask in the sun, dive into crystal clear waters or enjoy moments of luxury at the Anantara Spa.
